DOC.brief_title: Dehydrated Human Umbilical Cord Allograft Management Diabetic Foot Ulcers
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , multicenter , randomize control trial . The trial include approximately 66 subject 10 experienced clinical center United States . The estimated enrollment period 18 week ( include 2-week run-in period ) . After complete 2-week screening period , subject follow least 16 week post-randomization .
